text: Big Mutha Truckers 2 known in Europe as Big Mutha Truckers 2: Truck Me Harder is an racing video game, developed by Eutechnyx and published in North America by THQ while the European version published by Empire Interactive. Released on PlayStation 2, Xbox and Microsoft Windows in 2005, it is sequel to Big Mutha Truckers in 2002. title: Big Mutha Truckers 2
